title: Fireside With The Underboss - "He's A Killer Some Of Us Will End Up In The Trunk Of A Car"
description: Sammy tells a story about one of the mafias most brutal killers, Tommy Karate. Tommy's wife dies of an overdose and he will stop at nothing to find the woman who witnessed it.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy tells a story about one of the mafias most brutal killers, Tommy Karate. Tommy's wife dies of an overdose and he will stop at nothing to find the woman who witnessed it.
